welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Miyakojima, a charming island destination known for its pristine beaches, rich culture, and warm hospitality. Get ready to immerse yourself in the beauty of this city and create unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hirara Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Hirara Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited during peak hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Shimojishima Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Shimojishima Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Please connect to the designated network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
